ValidationRule.description: Appoint date must equal or greater than today
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( (ISNEW() || ISCHANGED(Appoint_Date_TIme__c)) && (DATEVALUE(Appoint_Date_TIme__c) < DATE( YEAR(TODAY()), MONTH(TODAY()), DAY(TODAY()))) ,TRUE ,FALSE)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Appoint Date is Invalid. Appoint Date Cannot Be The Past Date.
